DataElement.preferredName: Bioconductor caAffy Quantiles Robust Normalization Programming Parameter Probe Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A method for normalization based upon the concept of a quantile-quantile plot extended to n dimensions.  Defined in documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html:A value that is passed to a routine._General term for a piece of DNA or RNA corresponding to a gene or sequence of interest, that has been labelled either radioactively or with some other detectable molecule, such as biotin, digoxygenin or fluorescein. As stretches of DNA or RNA with complementary sequences will (hybridize), a probe will label viral plaques, bacterial colonies or bands on a gel that contain the gene of interest.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._The probe type used for normalization

Concepts.definition: A method for normalization based upon the concept of a quantile-quantile plot extended to n dimensions.  Defined in documents available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/1.9/bioc/html/affy.html
A value that is passed to a routine.

Property.preferredDefinition: General term for a piece of DNA or RNA corresponding to a gene or sequence of interest, that has been labelled either radioactively or with some other detectable molecule, such as biotin, digoxygenin or fluorescein. As stretches of DNA or RNA with complementary sequences will (hybridize), a probe will label viral plaques, bacterial colonies or bands on a gel that contain the gene of interest.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: General term for a piece of DNA or RNA corresponding to a gene or sequence of interest, that has been labelled either radioactively or with some other detectable molecule, such as biotin, digoxygenin or fluorescein. As stretches of DNA or RNA with complementary sequences will hybridize, a probe will label viral plaques, bacterial colonies or bands on a gel that contain the gene of interest.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released workflow status per 7/13/09 request of VCDE following successful Silver Compatibility review.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The probe type used for normalization

Concepts.definition: A 25 nucleotide probe with a sequence mismatch to its target at position 13 used for measuring non-specific binding in analysis of Affymetrix arrays.
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A 25 nucleotide probe with an exact sequence match to its target used in analysis of Affymetrix arrays.
Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11/2/2010 - released as part of model content cleanup activities per Todd Stokes, May D. Wang; associated with model CSI.
